title: Skin Gallery
body: Hello! Just wanted to make a discussion asking for a Skin Galley in LOL. Sometimes it hard to find the skins you own and some don't appear on the champion pages. I think a separate tab for skins in the champion tab or something would be awesome! Thanks for reading! {{summoner:31}}

replies.body:
There is a new league client coming. It is currently in Alpha.

Hopefully they will add something to that.
